attributes.action: Enter into negotiations with the President of the USA to have the UK admitted as the 51st state of the Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The  “special relationship” which exists between the USA and UK has endured over many years and through many changes of leaders .

So close are our two countries that it is now time to formalise this relationship to realise the benefits of positive synergies.

For the UK the benefits could be;

A much more straightforward immigration policy allowing easy travel and settlement between the two countries.

A secure and rigidly controlled border.

Strictly enforced and policed immigration policies.

A Police force which is trained, equipped and able to deal with offenders and is not afraid to challenge criminal behaviour at all levels.

An administration which is not afraid to invest in the building of new prisons rather than turning offenders loose because they cannot be accommodated.

A country where you, the ordinary citizen, will have an absolute right to defend your family and property against criminal threats.

The opportunity for a better quality of life.

A common armed force to protect the enlarged nation.

An end to EEC governance of our judicial system.

If you hope for a better life for yourself, your family and your children then please vote in favour of this petition.
